message.en:
Hi 👋, it's Anton, creator of this app. 

 Since this update hopefully all future updates will be explained throught these short dialogs. 

 And when you will have any idea 🗒 or noticed a bug 🐛 please don't hesitate to contact me in Discord (Arenukvern) (see button at the left bottom corner) or send email 📬 to idea@xsoulspace.dev - this info always available in information ("i" button on the top of screen)

  

 Have a nice day and week! 
 Anton
